comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content:
First Degree Charge Against Physician's Wife for Slaying Mrs. Bailey

An indictment charging her with manslaughter in the first degree, in a sealed presentment to be opened by Supreme Court Justice Van Siclen in the Nassau County Court House tomorrow, was the prospect faced by Mrs. Florence Carman in her cell in the Mineola jail when the Grand Jury adjourned at 4:55 o'clock this afternoon, after completing its investigation into the slaying of Mrs. Lulu D. Bailey.
